attributes.contentHtml: No need to be overly professional and formal in this case, we do not need to change our personality during an informal conversation. I run my site the way I run it, during reports and other formalities we treat it differently of course, however, something like this does not require that. Jedrik has actually been quite polite and considerate at first, and after you acting childishly and adding unnecessary/idiotic comments, with your intention to infuriate someone, he's in his right to treat you the way you're supposed to be treated. We've been considerate and kept this thread open all this time, so if you have any real arguments to add, go ahead and do so. Sloth out
